game.name: Volcano Oden
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: A SAVE-EVERYONE type game where, just like a 911 operator, you make decisions based on the layout of the map or even based on past decisions. The deep psychological-horror story can only be uncovered by helping everyone. Should you save them all, the truth will finally come out...
game.shortDescriptionEn: A SAVE-EVERYONE type game where, just like a 911 operator, you make decisions based on the layout of the map or even based on past decisions. The deep psychological-horror story can only be uncovered by helping everyone. Should you save them all, the truth will finally come out...
